column5: Wow! Check out the vid on youtube of Uncut Anglings umbrella rig musky fishing. I love this show, good fishing and a sense of humour!!!
Great video! Thanks for sharing
very cool episode! Great show.
Great video going to have to give that a try
Awesome video. Those guys r funny too.
on one of the rigs they had 5 hooks. illegal in Ontario. as we all know a treble counts as 1 hook on artificial lures. the max. hooks on a fishing line/rod is 4 in Ontario.

on one of the rigs they had 5 hooks. illegal in Ontario. as we all know a treble counts as 1 hook on artificial lures. the max. hooks on a fishing line/rod is 4 in Ontario.  Which one?  They did explain that they had cut hooks off of some lures to keep within the four hook rule.
Id have to rewatch it. They explain the legality and appear to comply
Really cool video!!
I only see 4 hooks.  Be sure to note that they removed the hooks entirely from one of the baits.
I watched it with no sound oh well I must be mistaken.. but at 7.05 of the video I saw the feller on the right holding the rig with 5 hooks. my mistake gents
Great video,there sure not afraid to show you how to catch musky their way .Could only imagine the drag on the rod and reel trolling those big baits .
That was excellent, thanks for letting us know about the video !!
very very cool show.  i love this type of stuff.  pioneers come to mind.  great stuff!
Im thinking this is going to work great for lakers through the ice.  Cool vid.
I was thinking all year about getting Mike P to make me a rig and run 4 bulldogs...
Getting two or more muskies on at once would fun.
Great video! There's always the haters and nit-pickers for everything. Get sickening....

Great video! There's always the haters and nit-pickers for everything. Get sickening.... sorry if I broke your bubble. obviously referring to my comments... I saw and was mistaken.... if that's your take of my comments I will refrain.... have a great winter
Watched that vid last night and thought that was about as innovative as it gets... the watched Red Chair Swing and howled.  Wiebe is a dweeb and funny as heckle.

sorry if I broke your bubble. obviously referring to my comments... I saw and was mistaken.... if that's your take of my comments I will refrain.... have a great winter  It's all good man, same to you.
